name: IOWA INTERSTATE RAILROAD, LTD
description: Freight railroad serving Iowa and Illinois
sampleDescriptions: Support for competitive infrastructure funding proposals for state and local governments and support for the permanency of the Section 45G short line railroad tax credit.
Support for competitive infrastructure funding proposals for state and local governments and support for the permanency of the Section 45G short line railroad tax credit.
H.R. 876/S.407 Building Rail Access for Customers and the Economy Act (BRACE Act) - support enactment of legislation to make the Section 45G short line railroad tax credit permanent.
No bill number - Support for two US DOT FY18 Consolidated Rail Infrastructure and Safety Improvement (CRISI) grant applications for critical infrastructure and safety upgrades in Iowa and Illinois.
H.R. 876/S.407 Building Rail Access for Customers and the Economy Act (BRACE Act) - support enactment of legislation to make the Section 45G short line railroad tax credit permanent.
